description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Abominations:
If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Abomination}s, enemies always have {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_WEAK} and {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_VULNERABLE}, and take 50% more damage. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Abomination
